data.eml:eml: A new species and new record of the leafhopper genus Balclutha (Hemiptera: Cicadellidae: Deltocephalinae) from China with key to species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Sun, Jing, Zhang, Yalin, Lu, Lin, Webb, M. D. (2019): A new species and new record of the leafhopper genus Balclutha (Hemiptera: Cicadellidae: Deltocephalinae) from China with key to species. Zootaxa 4551 (4): 494-500, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4551.4.10
